title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, January 30, 2020
description: Today is the anniversary of Bloody Sunday, the 1972 shooting of unarmed civil rights demonstrators in Derry, Northern Ireland by the British army.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the anniversary of Bloody Sunday, the 1972 shooting of unarmed civil rights demonstrators in Derry, Northern Ireland by the British army.
